name: The Shrink Box
description:
NOTE: Your initial health can take 3 hits, but this decreases as your player character shrinks.

By your final size you have 1 hit point so be careful!

The core concept of the game is to shrink and escape through the hole.

Personal time constraints resticted the game from being fully developed. Stay tuned for a big update once the jam is over.

Planned features were:

  • Another enemy type
  • Sound and music
  • Final layer of polish to art assets
  • A win screen (currently game closes on winning)
  • A UI to show player health
  • Adjusted timings and player speed to fine tune difficulty
  • An introduction / tutorial level

Hope you enjoy, leave any feedback you want.
